com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item

Class ItemStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.JsRegisteredClass
      • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.mod.MinecraftClassWrapper
        • com.pcr3w.jscraft.minecraft.item.ItemStack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWrapper

    public class ItemStack
extends MinecraftClassWrapper
    This class wraps around a Minecraft ItemStack and allows the methods and fields to be accessed
    Author:
    pcr3w

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemStack(Block block)
      Creates a new itemstack containing 1 of the given block

      Creates a new itemstack containing a specified amount of the given block

      Creates a new itemstack containing a specified amount of the given block with the given metadata

      Creates a new itemstack containing 1 of the given item

      Creates a new itemstack wrapping around a Minecraft itemstack
